Structs/SRTPerformanceData.html#/s:13SRT.name: msTimeStamp
Structs/SRTPerformanceData.html#/s:13SRT.abstract: The time since the UDT entity is started, in milliseconds.

Structs/SRTPerformanceData.html#/s:13SRT.name: pktSentTotal
Structs/SRTPerformanceData.html#/s:13SRT.abstract: The total number of sent data packets, including retransmissions.

Structs/SRTPerformanceData.html#/s:13SRT.name: pktSndLossTotal
Structs/SRTPerformanceData.html#/s:13SRT.abstract: The total number of lost packets (sender side)

Structs/SRTPerformanceData.html#/s:13SRT.name: pktRcvLossTotal
Structs/SRTPerformanceData.html#/s:13SRT.abstract: The total number of lost packets (receiver side)

Structs/SRTPerformanceData.html#/s:13SRT.name: pktSentACKTotal
Structs/SRTPerformanceData.html#/s:13SRT.abstract: The total number of sent ACK packets

Structs/SRTPerformanceData.html#/s:13SRT.name: pktRecvACKTotal
Structs/SRTPerformanceData.html#/s:13SRT.abstract: The total number of received ACK packets

Structs/SRTPerformanceData.html#/s:13SRT.name: pktSentNAKTotal
Structs/SRTPerformanceData.html#/s:13SRT.abstract: The total number of sent NAK packets

Structs/SRTPerformanceData.html#/s:13SRT.name: pktRecvNAKTotal
Structs/SRTPerformanceData.html#/s:13SRT.abstract: The total number of received NAK packets

Structs/SRTPerformanceData.html#/s:13SRT.name: usSndDurationTotal
Structs/SRTPerformanceData.html#/s:13SRT.abstract: The total time duration when UDT is sending data (idle time exclusive)

Structs/SRTPerformanceData.html#/s:13SRT.name: pktRcvDropTotal
Structs/SRTPerformanceData.html#/s:13SRT.abstract: The number of too-late-to play missing packets

Structs/SRTPerformanceData.html#/s:13SRT.name: byteSentTotal
Structs/SRTPerformanceData.html#/s:13SRT.abstract: The total number of sent data bytes, including retransmissions

Structs/SRTPerformanceData.html#/s:13SRT.name: byteRcvDropTotal
Structs/SRTPerformanceData.html#/s:13SRT.abstract: The number of too-late-to play missing bytes (estimate based on average packet size)

Structs/SRTPerformanceData.html#/s:13SRT.name: pktSent
Structs/SRTPerformanceData.html#/s:13SRT.abstract: The number of sent data packets, including retransmissions

Structs/SRTPerformanceData.html#/s:13SRT.name: usSndDuration
Structs/SRTPerformanceData.html#/s:13SRT.abstract: The busy sending time (i.e., idle time exclusive)

Structs/SRTPerformanceData.html#/s:13SRT.name: pktReorderDistance
Structs/SRTPerformanceData.html#/s:13SRT.abstract: The size of order discrepancy in received sequences

Structs/SRTPerformanceData.html#/s:13SRT.name: pktRcvAvgBelatedTime
Structs/SRTPerformanceData.html#/s:13SRT.abstract: The average time of packet delay for belated packets (packets with sequence past the ACK)

Structs/SRTPerformanceData.html#/s:13SRT.name: pktRcvBelated
Structs/SRTPerformanceData.html#/s:13SRT.abstract: The number of received AND IGNORED packets due to having come too late

Structs/SRTPerformanceData.html#/s:13SRT.name: pktRcvDrop
Structs/SRTPerformanceData.html#/s:13SRT.abstract: The number of too-late-to play missing packets

Structs/SRTPerformanceData.html#/s:13SRT.name: byteSent
Structs/SRTPerformanceData.html#/s:13SRT.abstract: The number of sent data bytes, including retransmissions

Structs/SRTPerformanceData.html#/s:13SRT.name: byteRcvDrop
Structs/SRTPerformanceData.html#/s:13SRT.abstract: The number of too-late-to play missing bytes (estimate based on average packet size)

Structs/SRTPerformanceData.html#/s:13SRT.name: pktFlowWindow
Structs/SRTPerformanceData.html#/s:13SRT.abstract: The flow window size, in number of packets

Structs/SRTPerformanceData.html#/s:13SRT.name: pktCongestionWindow
Structs/SRTPerformanceData.html#/s:13SRT.abstract: The congestion window size, in number of packets

Structs/SRTPerformanceData.html#/s:13SRT.name: pktSndFilterExtraTotal
Structs/SRTPerformanceData.html#/s:13SRT.abstract: The number of control packets supplied by packet filter

Structs/SRTPerformanceData.html#/s:13SRT.name: pktRcvFilterExtraTotal
Structs/SRTPerformanceData.html#/s:13SRT.abstract: The number of control packets received and not supplied back

Structs/SRTPerformanceData.html#/s:13SRT.name: pktRcvFilterSupplyTotal
Structs/SRTPerformanceData.html#/s:13SRT.abstract: The number of packets that the filter supplied extra (e.g. FEC rebuilt)

Structs/SRTPerformanceData.html#/s:13SRT.name: pktRcvFilterLossTotal
Structs/SRTPerformanceData.html#/s:13SRT.abstract: The number of packet loss not coverable by filter

Structs/SRTPerformanceData.html#/s:13SRT.name: pktSndFilterExtra
Structs/SRTPerformanceData.html#/s:13SRT.abstract: The number of control packets supplied by packet filter

Structs/SRTPerformanceData.html#/s:13SRT.name: pktRcvFilterExtra
Structs/SRTPerformanceData.html#/s:13SRT.abstract: The number of control packets received and not supplied back

Structs/SRTPerformanceData.html#/s:13SRT.name: pktRcvFilterSupply
Structs/SRTPerformanceData.html#/s:13SRT.abstract: The number of packets that the filter supplied extra (e.g. FEC rebuilt)

Structs/SRTPerformanceData.html#/s:13SRT.name: pktRcvFilterLoss
Structs/SRTPerformanceData.html#/s:13SRT.abstract: The number of packet loss not coverable by filter
